Your subscription has been successfully.

items.receive_recycle_bag: Receive a FREE brand new Eco Hope recycle bag

items.collect_bag: Courier will come to collect the bag. Start Tracking your recycle impact! One foe One****

items.empty_bottles: Empty bottles completely, clean with water
items.squash_bottles: Squash bottles lengthwise to save space
items.dont_overfill: Do not overfill plastic bottles, to avoid the bag bursting or bottles sticking out
items.dont_attach_item: Do not attach items on the outside of the bag
